name: An ancient, engraved stone hanging on a chain
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It has negative armour class for its type (negative in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It decreases the users physical resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers a bit slower than avarage.
